materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a cantonment by the Salween River in Moulmein. In the center of the photograph, there are rows of roofed buildings amidst trees and vegetation. On the bottom-left of the photograph there is a three-leveled building structure. The Salween River is in the background of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Cantonment & Salween River, Moolmein
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Salween River Moulmein (Burma)
